To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private SchaffTrendCycle _stc;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_stc = STC(symbol, cyclePeriod, fastPeriod, slowPeriod);

// In OnData()
if (_stc.IsReady)
{
    var current = _stc.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.stc = self.STC(symbol, cyclePeriod, fastPeriod, slowPeriod)

# In OnData()
if self.stc.IsReady:
    current = self.stc.Current.Value
